programme.title: Live Ford Super Sunday
programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur v Manchester United (Kick-off 4.00pm). All the action from the Premier League clash at White Hart Lane, as Spurs look to maintain their title challenge. Spurs have impressed this season with their attacking brand of football that has also yielded positive results, and they'll be hoping young guns such as Harry Kane and Delle Alli can continue that form during the title run-in. Meanwhile, the Red Devils continue to fight for a place in the top four, which would belie some of the doom and gloom that has surrounded Old Trafford throughout the campaign.(n)

programme.title: The Masters - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the fourth day from the Augusta National in Georgia, as the opening Major of the year reaches a conclusion. Jordan Spieth started the final day four shots ahead of his nearest rival last year and showed no signs of any nerves affecting his game, eventually holding that advantage ahead of Phil Mickelson and Justin Rose, who were tied for second. Spieth also equalled the lowest 72-hole total for the Masters and set the record for the most birdies for the week.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 92/93 & 93/94. We go back to the start of the first two seasons of the Premier League and take a look at the first 78 goals scored as United recorded back-to-back league titles.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 94/95 & 95/96. Volume 2 takes us from goal 79 to goal 156, including the record 9-0 win over Ipswich and United's fastest Premier League goal, scored by Ryan Giggs.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 96/97 & 97/98. Volume 3 takes us from goal 157 to goal 236, including Eric Cantona's famous chip against Sunderland and another league title for the Reds.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 98/99 & 99/00. Volume 4 takes us from goal 237 to goal 340. The Reds recorded a historic Treble and then went goal crazy, hitting 59 to win the league in 1999/2000.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 00/01 & 01/02. Volume 5 takes us from goal 341 to goal 429, including six of the best in one memorable afternoon against Arsenal.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 02/03 & 03/04. Volume 6 takes us from goal 430 to goal 508. The Reds' faithful were treated to the finishing prowess of Ruud van Nistelrooy, who scored three hat-tricks in 02/03.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 04/05 & 05/06. Volume 7 takes us from goal 509 to goal 576, including Wayne Rooney's majestic volley against Newcastle as he announced himself as the next United superstar.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 06/07 & 07/08. Volume 8 takes us from goal 577 to goal 669, as the Reds reclaimed their Premier League crown and Cristiano Ronaldo scored goal after goal, including 21 in a season.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 08/09 & 09/10. Volume 9 goes from goal 670 to goal 764, including Federico Macheda's debut strike, a four-goal haul for Wayne Rooney and a dream derby winner from Michael Owen.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 10/11 & 11/12. Volume 10 takes us from goal 765 to goal 865, including a memorable derby goal from Wayne Rooney and a remarkable afternoon against Arsenal, as the Reds hit eight.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 12/13 & 13/14. Volume 11 takes us from goal 866 to goal 9­39. Robin van Persie's goals helped the Reds to league title number 20 as Sir Alex Ferguson bowed out in style.(n)

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 14/15 & 15/16. Volume 12 takes us over the finish line, starting with goal 940. The final 60 strikes include memorable debuts for Anthony Martial and Marcus Rashford.(n)

programme.title: Frosinone - Inter (diretta)
programme.desc: Cod. 493095. Serie A. 32a giornata. Collegamento ore 14:00 con Prepartita. Laziali con un solo successo (2-0 sull'Udinese) nelle ultime 6 giornate. Non segnano da 199 minuti. -2 dalla zona salvezza. Sconfitti 4 a 0 nella gara d'andata a San Siro. Inter con un solo punto negli ultimi 2 turni e con appena 3 punti nelle ultime 6 trasferte di A. -8 dal terzo posto. Commento: Marinozzi-Muraro(n)

programme.title: Sassuolo - Genoa (diretta)
programme.desc: Cod. 493073. Serie A. 32a giornata. Collegamento ore 17:30 con Prepartita. Emiliani con un solo ko (1-0 contro la Juventus) nelle ultime 8 giornate, per il resto 4 vittorie e 3 pareggi. -1 dal sesto posto del Milan. Genoa reduce dalla 3^ vittoria (4-0 sul Frosinone) negli ultimi 4 turni., ma a Reggio Emilia ha perso entrambi i precedenti di serie A (4-2 e 3-1). Commento: Massara-Marocchi(n)

programme.title: Milan - Juventus (diretta)
programme.desc: Serie A. Anticipo 32a giornata. Per i rossoneri soltanto 2 punti nelle ultime 4 giornate. +1 sul Sassuolo, settimo. Il Milan non batte in assoluto la Juventus in campionato da 4 anni (1-0 nel 2012), poi 6 sconfitte consecutive. Bianconeri con 20 vittorie e 1 pareggio nelle ultime 21 giornate. +6 sul Napoli. Commento: Caressa-Bergomi(n)

programme.title: I Signori del Calcio: Cannavaro
programme.desc: L'ex Pallone d'Oro Fabio Cannavaro ripercorre le fasi principali della propria carriera e fa il punto sui suoi progetti futuri. Nella meravigliosa cornice del golfo di Napoli, il campione del mondo 2006 parla del campionato italiano, della sua carriera da allenatore tra speranze e obiettivi, del Napoli di De Laurentiis e della grande stagione di Higuain e, infine, del sogno Nazionale(n)

programme.title: Empoli - Fiorentina 10/04
programme.desc: Cod. 493062. Serie A. 32a giornata. Collegamento ore 12:00 con Prepartita. Gli azzurri di Giampaolo non vincono da 3 mesi nei quali hanno ottenuto 6 pareggi e 6 sconfitte. In casa hanno vinto una sola volta (1-0 nel 1986) negli 8 precedenti di serie A contro i viola, per il resto 3 pareggi e 4 sconfitte. La Fiorentina non vince da 5 giornate e resta a -7 dal terzo posto. Commento: Tecca-Onofri(n)
